name: Youngjin Park
body:
# Contacts
##Email
yjpark[A.T]3map[DOT]snu[DOT]ac[DOT]kr
##Office
Room 315-1, Building 302, Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea


# Research Interests
Computer Geometric Modeling


# Education
##M.S./Ph.D in Computer Science & Engineering
Seoul National University, 2016 - 
##B.S. in Computer Science & Engineering 
Pusan National University, 2012 - 2016

# Award & Honors
### Top prize, Graduation Project
"Speed Big Data & Real-Time Predict Based Navigation", Pusan National University, 2015


###19th place, ACM-ICPC Asia Daejeon Regional Contest
ACM-ICPC, 2014

###National Scholarship for Science and Engineering
Korea Scholarship Foundation, 2014 - 2015
Full tuition(about $2300/semester)

###Merit-Based Scholarship
Pusan National University, 2012 - 2013
2nd-grade (about $2000/semester)


# Other Interest


##Club Activity

* ###Con Brio Orchestra
Violin, Viola and Cello, 2013 - 2015
2013 Sep. - 2014 Sep, Chair
2013 Sep. - 2014 Mar, Concert Master 

* ###Seoul Digital Valley Orchestra
Viola, 2016 -
